name: Chromaestro
description:
A musical puzzle game, starring Chromie the cat! Connect Green Gems to score points; the longer the path, the more points you earn. Red Gems will block your path and can create pits, while Blue Gems will restore tiles and give you a bonus. The positions of the gems will create music as you play the game!

The game includes:

* Six unlockable songs, with more to come
* Unlockable game modes (Tempo, Excerpt, and Performance)
* Unlockable accessories for Chromie

(Like many video games, this game contains flashing lights. If you are sensitive to flashing lights, please do not play this app.)
